Title: Kansas City Railroad Pocket Watch - Limited Edition Silver Tone

Product Details This nostalgic time-piece is inspired by Jesse James’ Train Robbery 1874. Features handsomely adorned silver tone bezel, sturdy butterfly hinge, Roman numeral dial, second hand and 26" chain and fob. New & Improved Quartz Movement - Never Needs Winding! The antique style pocket watch comes with Certificate of Authenticity. It is certified by the American Historic Society. This elegant collectible is designed to commemorate the glory of the Old West.
